title: Person of Interest: Reese & Finch VS Extortionist Assasin
author: POI Fights
comment: Can you get the scene of Root saving Finch from Claire

In hindsight, isn't this scene a little cheese in the sense that the bad guy needs to talk and explain his motives to Harold and Emma just give Mr. Reese enough time to get there and save them? I mean, why didn't he just kill Finch instead of talking and explaining why he's about to kill him?
did it look like john took that chair to the back so harold wouldnt? or is that just my imagination <3 ship them so much
description: Fight Scene from S04 X E14: Guilty
